name: Yummy Girl 2
description:
Sweet buns, ruddy cupcakes, juicy burgers - all these yummy girls love to eat. They are just waiting for you to feed them! ( ˘▽˘)っ♨

Easy win: Keyboard Сtrl+D - Complete Level
In the game, your goal is to collect the puzzle in order to restore the pictures.

FEATURES

  • ❀ Beautiful artwork
  • ❀ Animation scenes
  • ❀ Relaxing music
  • ❀ CG Gallery Mode
  • ❀ Puzzle game
